tasks.task: Managing pasture and cattle without extensive mechanization or grain feeding.
subtasks: Observing and evaluating pasture草场状况评估) conditions.
Selecting appropriate cattle breeds for grazing on pasture and corn stalks.
Letting cows graze on grass and corn stalks without supplemental grain feeding.

tasks.task: Making grass more profitable through cattle management.
subtasks: Understanding economic benefits of grass-fed cattle.
Possibly implementing better grass management practices to increase profitability.
